blocks.text: Use your usual PowerScribe login URL.

items: Open PowerScribe, go to File -> Manage Servers.
Enter: Name: Small Spare RAS URL: https://pso-dbs-n01.whs.int/ras License Token: leave blank (not used).
Click OK. Note: The Server field only appears if more than one server exists.
Log off PowerScribe only (other apps may remain running).
On the login window, choose Small Spare in the Server field.
Log back in with your usual PowerScribe username and password.
PACS should reconnect to PowerScribe and allow work to continue.
Select Production or Default in the Server field.
Server field appears only when multiple servers are configured.
From Jurgens (10.29.25): use https:// in the Small Spare URL; confirmed working remotely.
Leave License Token blank when adding the Small Spare server.
